items.value:
There you are again!
Was Romana happy about the cake?

Please give me the invitation card she gave you !!!
I'm really looking forward to Romona's birthday party ...
yes she was happy, here is the Card!
no but i will visit here soon!

Yeyyy the party is rising soon!
Maybe I can take you with us, let's see.

Now I have to keep working.
If you need a job, drop by!

You got: 1x A Practical Man, Vol.1, 1x filled Wallet

You don't have the card yet: (((
Please visit Romana and give her the cake.
She will give you a card that I urgently need!

Kelly needs:
1x Birthday Invitation Card
